title: Quick and dirty modification of an existing vehicle

content.raw:
I edited `/subt_ws/src/subt/submitted_models/ssci_x2_sensor_config_1/model.sdf` file and changed camera angles. I’ve run `catkin_make install` on `subt_ws`. When I test the new model with `ign launch example.ign` in model’s directory, I can observe effect of new camera angle, but when I run the normal simulation

 `ign launch urban_circuit.ign worldName:=urban_qual robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=SSCI_X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_1`

I don’t see the changes. What has to be done to have new model definition globally available?
content.html:

When I test the new model with ign launch example.ign in model’s directory, I can observe effect of new camera angle, but when I run the normal simulation

I don’t see the changes. What has to be done to have new model definition globally available?
